title: SHIELD (XSH) One Day Trading Volume Hits $17,217.00
content: SHIELD (CURRENCY:XSH) traded up 2.6% against the dollar during the 1-day period ending at 17:00 PM ET on May 26th. One SHIELD coin can now be purchased for approximately $0.0318 or 0.00000417 BTC on exchanges including CoinExchange, Stocks.Exchange, Trade Satoshi and SouthXchange. SHIELD has a total market capitalization of $15.34 million and approximately $17,217.00 worth […]
